title: My Morning Coffee
summary: A small-batch, medium-roast coffee blend that keeps me going — bright, balanced, and comforting every morning.
description: This is my everyday coffee. A carefully curated small-batch Arabian blend that strikes a warm balance of deep, earthy notes, toasted nuts, and a gentle citrus brightness. Perfect as a daily cup — bold enough to kick-start your focus, gentle enough for a slow sip.
